member.summary: Font weight enumeration

member.summary: DrawText enumeration

member.summary: Misc GDI constants

member.name: T:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT
member.summary: Represents Windows GDI LOGFONT structure

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfHeight
member.summary: Specifies the height, in logical units, of the font's character cell or character

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfWidth
member.summary: Specifies the average width, in logical units, of characters in the font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfEscapement
member.summary: Specifies the angle, in tenths of degrees, between the escapement vector and the x-axis of the device

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfOrientation
member.summary: Specifies the angle, in tenths of degrees, between each character's base line and the x-axis of the device

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfWeight
member.summary: Specifies the weight of the font in the range 0 through 1000

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfItalic
member.summary: TRUE to specify an italic font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfUnderline
member.summary: TRUE to specify an underlined font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfStrikeOut
member.summary: TRUE to specify a strikeout font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfCharSet
member.summary: Specifies the character set

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfOutPrecision
member.summary: Specifies the output precision

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfClipPrecision
member.summary: Specifies the clipping precision

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfQuality
member.summary: Specifies the output quality

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfPitchAndFamily
member.summary: Specifies the pitch and family of the font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.lfFaceName
member.summary: Specifies a null-terminated string that specifies the typeface name of the font

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.Init
member.summary: Initializes structure with default values

member.summary: Gets font size in points
member.returns: Font size in points

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.SetFontSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets font size from points

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.SetFontFace(System.String)
member.summary: Sets new font face name

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.ToString
member.summary: Gets string representation of structure
member.returns: String representation of structure

member.summary: Compares two LOGFONT structures
member.returns: True if structures are equal, false otherwise

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.op_Inequality(PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT,PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT)
member.summary: Compares two LOGFONT structures
member.returns: True if structures are not equal, false otherwise

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.
member.returns: true if and this instance are the same type and represent the same value; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.Equals(PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT)
member.summary: Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.
member.returns: true if and this instance are the same type and represent the same value; otherwise, false.
member.param: Another LOGFONT structure to compare to.

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.

member.name: T:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC
member.summary: Represents Windows GDI NEWTEXTMETRIC structure

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmHeight
member.summary: The height (ascent + descent) of characters

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmAscent
member.summary: The ascent (units above the base line) of characters

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmDescent
member.summary: The descent (units below the base line) of characters

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmInternalLeading
member.summary: The amount of leading (space) inside the bounds set by the tmHeight member

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmExternalLeading
member.summary: The amount of extra leading (space) that the application adds between rows

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmAveCharWidth
member.summary: The average width of characters in the font (generally defined as the width of the letter x)

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmMaxCharWidth
member.summary: The width of the widest character in the font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmWeight
member.summary: The weight of the font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmOverhang
member.summary: The extra width per string that may be added to some synthesized fonts. When synthesizing some attributes, such as bold or italic, graphics device interface (GDI) or a device may have to add width to a string on both a per-character and per-string basis

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmDigitizedAspectX
member.summary: The horizontal aspect of the device for which the font was designed

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmDigitizedAspectY
member.summary: The vertical aspect of the device for which the font was designed

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmFirstChar
member.summary: The value of the first character defined in the font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmLastChar
member.summary: The value of the last character defined in the font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmDefaultChar
member.summary: The value of the character to be substituted for characters that are not in the font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmBreakChar
member.summary: The value of the character to be used to define word breaks for text justification

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmItalic
member.summary: An italic font if it is nonzero

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmUnderlined
member.summary: An underlined font if it is nonzero

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmStruckOut
member.summary: A strikeout font if it is nonzero

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmPitchAndFamily
member.summary: The pitch and family of the selected font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.tmCharSet
member.summary: The character set of the font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.ntmFlags
member.summary: Specifies whether the font is italic, underscored, outlined, bold, and so forth

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.ntmSizeEM
member.summary: The size of the em square for the font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.ntmCellHeight
member.summary: The height, in notional units, of the font

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.NEWTEXTMETRIC.ntmAvgWidth
member.summary: The average width of characters in the font, in notional units

member.name: T:PNStaticFonts.RECT
member.summary: Represents Windows GDI RECT structure

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.RECT.left
member.summary: Specifies the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of a rectangle

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.RECT.top
member.summary: Specifies the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of a rectangle

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.RECT.right
member.summary: Specifies the x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of a rectangle

member.name: F:PNStaticFonts.RECT.bottom
member.summary: Specifies the y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of a rectangle

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.RECT.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates instance of RECT structure

member.name: T:PNStaticFonts.Fonts
member.summary: Represents class for various GDI fonts operations

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.GetDC(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Retrieves a handle to a device context (DC) for the client area of a specified window or for the entire screen
member.param: A handle to the window whose DC is to be retrieved. If this value is NULL, GetDC retrieves the DC for the entire screen
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is a handle to the DC for the specified window's client area.If the function fails, the return value is NULL

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.ReleaseDC(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Releases a device context (DC), freeing it for use by other applications
member.param: A handle to the window whose DC is to be released
A handle to the DC to be released
member.returns: The return value indicates whether the DC was released. If the DC was released, the return value is 1.If the DC was not released, the return value is zero

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.MulDiv(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The MulDiv function multiplies two 32-bit values and then divides the 64-bit result by a third 32-bit value
member.param: Number by which the result of the multiplication is to be divided
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is the result of the multiplication and division. If either an overflow occurred or nDenominator was 0, the return value is â€“1

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.GetDeviceCaps(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves device-specific information for the specified device
member.returns: The return value specifies the value of the desired item

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.GetSysColorBrush(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a handle identifying a logical brush that corresponds to the specified color index
member.param: A color index. This value corresponds to the color used to paint one of the window elements
member.returns: The return value identifies a logical brush if the nIndex parameter is supported by the current platform. Otherwise, it returns NULL

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.GetSysColor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the current color of the specified display element. Display elements are the parts of a window and the display that appear on the system display screen
member.param: The display element whose color is to be retrieved
member.returns: The function returns the red, green, blue (RGB) color value of the given element

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.SetBkMode(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the background mix mode of the specified device context
member.param: A handle to the device context
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value specifies the previous background mode.If the function fails, the return value is zero

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.FillRect(System.IntPtr,PNStaticFonts.RECT,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Fills a rectangle by using the specified brush
member.param: A handle to the device context
A pointer to a RECT structure that contains the logical coordinates of the rectangle to be filled
A handle to the brush used to fill the rectangle
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is nonzero

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.SetTextColor(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the text color for the specified device context to the specified color
member.param: A handle to the device context
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is a color reference for the previous text color as a COLORREF value. If the function fails, the return value is CLR_INVALID

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.DrawText(System.IntPtr,System.String,System.Int32,PNStaticFonts.RECT,PNStaticFonts.DTStyles)
member.summary: Draws formatted text in the specified rectangle. It formats the text according to the specified method (expanding tabs, justifying characters, breaking lines, and so forth)
member.param: A handle to the device context
A pointer to the string that specifies the text to be drawn. If the nCount parameter is -1, the string must be null-terminated
The length, in characters, of the string. If nCount is -1, then the lpchText parameter is assumed to be a pointer to a null-terminated string and DrawText computes the character count automatically
A pointer to a RECT structure that contains the rectangle (in logical coordinates) in which the text is to be formatted
The method of formatting the text
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is the height of the text in logical units. If DT_VCENTER or DT_BOTTOM is specified, the return value is the offset from lpRect->top to the bottom of the drawn text If the function fails, the return value is zero

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.CreateFontIndirect(PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT@)
member.summary: Creates a logical font that has the specified characteristics. The font can subsequently be selected as the current font for any device context
member.param: A pointer to a LOGFONT structure that defines the characteristics of the logical font
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is a handle to a logical font. If the function fails, the return value is NULL

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.SelectObject(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: selects an object into the specified device context (DC). The new object replaces the previous object of the same type
member.param: A handle to the object to be selected
member.returns: If the selected object is not a region and the function succeeds, the return value is a handle to the object being replaced

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.DeleteObject(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Deletes a logical pen, brush, font, bitmap, region, or palette, freeing all system resources associated with the object. After the object is deleted, the specified handle is no longer valid
member.param: A handle to a logical pen, brush, font, bitmap, region, or palette
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is nonzero. If the specified handle is not valid or is currently selected into a DC, the return value is zero

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.GetFontsList(System.Collections.Generic.List{PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT})
member.summary: Collects installed fonts names and fills List of LOGFONT structures
member.param: List of LOGFONT structures to fill

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.MeasureString(System.Drawing.Graphics,PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT,System.String)
member.summary: Measures string accordingly to GDI device context and specified font
member.param: Graphics object to get device context
member.returns: Size of string measures

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.DrawFontNameGDI(System.Drawing.Graphics,PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Draw font name on GDI device context

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.DrawTextGDI(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT,System.String,PNStaticFonts.DTStyles)
member.summary: Draws text on GDI device context

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.RegisterCustomFonts(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.IO.FileInfo})
member.summary: Registers custom fonts

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.UnregisterCustomFonts(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Unregisters custom fonts

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.Fonts.IsUnicodeCharAvailable(System.Char,System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether character is available for specified font

member.name: T:PNStaticFonts.LogFontConverter
member.summary: Converts LOGFONT structure to and from string

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.LogFontConverter.ConvertToString(PNStaticFonts.LOGFONT)
member.summary: Converts LOGFONT structure to string
member.returns: String

member.name: M:PNStaticFonts.LogFontConverter.ConvertFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Converts string to LOGFONT structure
member.returns: LOGFONT structure
